input_email_body:
Subject: Request for Support

Customer Support, encountered an unexpected charge on my account, which is affecting our budget for digital marketing activities. This might have occurred due to a billing error or miscommunication related to package upgrades You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. After verifying subscription details and checking for unauthorized transactions, the issue still persists. Could you please look into this matter and provide a resolution and explanation for the charge? I appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue and would like a detailed breakdown of my current subscription and any recent changes. Thank you. My name is Jane Smith.
